verses.verse: How doth the city <S%H5892><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> solitary <S%H910><s%>, that was full <S%H7227><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%>! She is become as a widow <S%H490><s%>, that was great <S%H7227><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>! She that was a princess <S%H8282><s%> among the provinces <S%H4082><s%> is become tributary <S%H4522><s%>!

She weepeth <S%H1058><s%> sore <S%H1058><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>, and her tears <S%H1832><s%> are on her cheeks <S%H3895><s%>; Among all her lovers <S%H157><s%> she hath none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> her <S%H7453><s%>: All her friends have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with her <S%H341><s%>; they are become her enemies.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is gone into captivity <S%H1540><s%> because of affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and because of great <S%H7230><s%> servitude <S%H5656><s%>; She dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, she findeth <S%H4672><s%> no rest <S%H4494><s%>: All her persecutors <S%H7291><s%> overtook <S%H5381><s%> her within the straits <S%H4712><s%>.

The ways <S%H1870><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> do mourn <S%H57><s%>, because none come <S%H935><s%> to the solemn assembly <S%H4150><s%>; All her gates <S%H8179><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%>, her priests <S%H3548><s%> do sigh <S%H584><s%>: Her virgins <S%H1330><s%> are afflicted <S%H3013><s%>, and she herself is in bitterness <S%H4843><s%>.

Her adversaries <S%H6862><s%> are become the head <S%H7218><s%>, her enemies <S%H341><s%> prosper <S%H7951><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath afflicted <S%H3013><s%> her for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of her transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: Her young children <S%H5768><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the adversary <S%H6862><s%>.

And from the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> all her majesty <S%H1926><s%> is departed <S%H3318><s%>: Her princes <S%H8269><s%> are become like harts <S%H354><s%> that find <S%H4672><s%> no pasture <S%H4829><s%>, And they are gone <S%H3212><s%> without strength <S%H3581><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the pursuer <S%H7291><s%>.

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> remembereth <S%H2142><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her affliction <S%H6040><s%> and of her miseries <S%H4788><s%> all her pleasant things <S%H4262><s%> that were from the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>: When her people <S%H5971><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary <S%H6862><s%>, and none did help <S%H5826><s%> her <S%H6862><s%>, The adversaries saw <S%H7200><s%> her <S%H7832><s%>, they did mock at her desolations <S%H4868><s%>.

Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> hath grievously <S%H2399><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%>; therefore she is become <S%H5206><s%> as an unclean thing <S%H3513><s%>; All that honored her despise <S%H2107><s%> her <S%H7200><s%>, because they have seen her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: Yea <S%H584><s%>, she sigheth, and turneth <S%H7725><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>.

Her filthiness <S%H2932><s%> was in her skirts <S%H7757><s%>; she remembered <S%H2142><s%> not her latter end <S%H319><s%>; Therefore is she come down <S%H3381><s%> wonderfully <S%H6382><s%>; she hath no comforter <S%H5162><s%>: Behold <S%H7200><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, my affliction <S%H6040><s%>; for the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath magnified himself <S%H1431><s%>.

The adversary <S%H6862><s%> hath spread out <S%H6566><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon all her pleasant things <S%H4261><s%>: For she hath seen <S%H7200><s%> that the nations <S%H1471><s%> are entered <S%H935><s%> into her sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, Concerning whom thou didst command <S%H6680><s%> that they should not enter <S%H935><s%> into thine assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

All her people <S%H5971><s%> sigh <S%H584><s%>, they seek <S%H1245><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>; They have given <S%H5414><s%> their pleasant things <S%H4261><s%> for food <S%H400><s%> to refresh <S%H7725><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%>: See <S%H7200><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and behold <S%H5027><s%>; for I am become abject <S%H2151><s%>.

Is it nothing to you <S%H5674><s%>, all ye that pass by <S%H1870><s%>? Behold <S%H5027><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> if there be <S%H3426><s%> any sorrow <S%H4341><s%> like unto my sorrow <S%H4341><s%>, which is brought <S%H5953><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, Wherewith Jehovah hath afflicted <S%H3013><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>.

From on high <S%H4791><s%> hath he sent <S%H7971><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> into my bones <S%H6106><s%>, and it prevaileth <S%H7287><s%> against them <S%H6566><s%>; He hath spread a net <S%H7568><s%> for my feet <S%H7272><s%>, he hath turned <S%H7725><s%> me back <S%H268><s%>: He hath made <S%H5414><s%> me desolate <S%H8074><s%> and faint <S%H1739><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.

The yoke <S%H5923><s%> of my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> is bound <S%H8244><s%> by his hand <S%H3027><s%>; They are knit <S%H8276><s%> together <S%H5927><s%>, they are come up upon my neck <S%H6677><s%>; He hath made my strength <S%H3581><s%> to fail <S%H3782><s%>: The Lord <S%H136><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> me into their hands <S%H3027><s%>, against whom I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to stand <S%H6965><s%>.

The Lord <S%H136><s%> hath set at nought <S%H5541><s%> all my mighty <S%H47><s%> men in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of me <S%H7121><s%>; He hath called a solemn assembly <S%H4150><s%> against me to crush <S%H7665><s%> my young men <S%H970><s%>: The Lord <S%H136><s%> hath trodden <S%H1869><s%> as in a winepress <S%H1660><s%> the virgin <S%H1330><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

For these things I weep <S%H1058><s%>; mine eye <S%H5869><s%>, mine eye <S%H5869><s%> runneth down <S%H3381><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>; Because the comforter <S%H5162><s%> that should refresh <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H1121><s%>: My children are desolate <S%H8074><s%>, because the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath prevailed <S%H1396><s%>.

Zion <S%H6726><s%> spreadeth forth <S%H6566><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%>; there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> her <S%H3068><s%>; Jehovah hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> concerning Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, that they that are round about <S%H5439><s%> him should be his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>: Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is among them as an unclean thing <S%H5079><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%>; for I have rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against his commandment <S%H6310><s%>: Hear <S%H8085><s%>, I pray you <S%H5971><s%>, all ye peoples, and behold <S%H7200><s%> my sorrow <S%H4341><s%>: My virgins <S%H1330><s%> and my young men <S%H970><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>.

I called <S%H7121><s%> for my lovers <S%H157><s%>, but they deceived <S%H7411><s%> me <S%H3548><s%>: My priests and mine elders <S%H2205><s%> gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%>, While they sought <S%H1245><s%> them food <S%H400><s%> to refresh <S%H7725><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for I am in distress <S%H6887><s%>; my heart <S%H4578><s%> is troubled <S%H2560><s%>; My heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me <S%H4784><s%>; for I have grievously rebelled <S%H4784><s%>: Abroad <S%H2351><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> bereaveth <S%H7921><s%>, at home <S%H1004><s%> there is as death <S%H4194><s%>.

They have heard <S%H8085><s%> that I sigh <S%H584><s%>; there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> me <S%H341><s%>; all mine enemies have heard <S%H8085><s%> of my trouble <S%H7451><s%>; they are glad <S%H7797><s%> that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H935><s%>: Thou wilt bring the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou hast proclaimed <S%H7121><s%>, and they shall be like unto me <S%H3644><s%>.

Let all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H5953><s%>; And do unto them <S%H5953><s%>, as thou hast done unto me for all my transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: For my sighs <S%H585><s%> are many <S%H7227><s%>, and my heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint <S%H1742><s%>.
